title: 为什么启动不了啊？
author: supervegeto
txt_content: 为什么用正版登陆器登录时会显示“This application requires a java Runtime Environment 1.6.0，而用其他的会出现“This application requires a java Runtime Environment 1.5.0”啊

replies.author: arnod
replies.txt_content: 可以给我一个最佳问答吗，跪求

replies.author: supervegeto
replies.txt_content:
